Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பொறையொருங்கு மேல்வருங்கால் தாங்கி இறைவற்கு இறையொருங்கு நேர்வது நாடு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: A kingdom is that which can bear any burden that may be pressed on it (from adjoining kingdoms) and (yet) pay the full tribute to its sovereign.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A nation is personified as a mighty, titan-like figure. It is shown bearing an immense burden ('பொறை') placed upon it by external forces (like war or natural disaster), but it does not crumble; it stands firm ('தாங்கி').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Simultaneously, even while bearing this great burden, the nation-titan is shown willingly and without fail offering its full tribute ('இறை') to its king. The tribute flows from the titan to the king in a steady, golden stream.
Layered_Composition.Background: A strong and resilient kingdom that can withstand external pressures while still fulfilling its internal duties.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A true nation is one that can bear any external burdens while still unfailingly providing its required tribute to the state.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The nation as a burden-bearing titan is the central metaphor. The ability to both bear the external weight and provide the internal tribute at the same time is the key action.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: Dramatic, powerful lighting that highlights the strain and strength of the titan. The tribute is a glowing, golden stream, showing its value.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A low-angle, epic shot that emphasizes the strength and scale of the nation-titan.

Cultural_Anchors: The resilience of an ideal state.

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: titan crumbling, tribute stream cut off, text artifacts, cartoonish.
